channel.title: [PI] Shop Price Multiplier..? [PI]
channel.description:
I do not know where in ShopAssistant.java it is located, but example: I have item id "1" at "100000" (100k) in prices.txt. But in the store, it is "114999" (114k) to buy it. When you try to sell it, it is "100000" (100k).
How can I remove it?

item.title: [PI] Shop Price Multiplier..? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

Also, item.cfg has sell prices at end.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Shop Price Multiplier..? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:11, topic:406287”][quote author=imsuperman05 link=topic=503284.msg3681987#msg3681987 date=1311601958]

first of all, shopassistant.java is located src>server>models>shops

You need to read better.
I do not know where IN ShopAssistant.java the method is. I can find the class just fine…

Second, do you want to remove the item from the shop or change the price?

You’re missing the point.
Somewhere, the shop is multiplying the Prices.txt number by something and that ends up to be the “buy” price. I just want it to be directly the Prices.txt price, no multiplier.

There is no multiplier.

Add a fury to a shop. The fury is 100 coins, not 100k, not 50k, not 10k. 100 coins.
[/quote][/quote]
You’re a smart ass.
I found the solution

Under

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Shop Price Multiplier..? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz
item.description:
@FoCuSeD_KiNeTiKz wrote:

first of all, shopassistant.java is located src>server>models>shops

I do not know where IN ShopAssistant.java the method is. I can find the class just fine…

Second, do you want to remove the item from the shop or change the price?

You’re missing the point.
Somewhere, the shop is multiplying the Prices.txt number by something and that ends up to be the “buy” price. I just want it to be directly the Prices.txt price, no multiplier.

There is no multiplier.

Add a fury to a shop. The fury is 100 coins, not 100k, not 50k, not 10k. 100 coins.
[/quote]
Just because your server says that, doesn’t mean all of them are.

My server has the exact same problem. I try spawning max cash like “2147000000” of it and it spawns “2147483647”.

I’m not talking about spawning, I’m talking about a damn shop price.

Theres two itemprices.txt

Where’s the second one?[/quote]
My point is it says it in the shops and when i spawn.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Shop Price Multiplier..? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Impious_Lols Impious Lols
item.description:
@Impious_Lols wrote:

[quote=“Daniel™, post:8, topic:406287”][quote author=Impious Lols link=topic=503284.msg3682051#msg3682051 date=1311607206]

first of all, shopassistant.java is located src>server>models>shops

You need to read better.
I do not know where IN ShopAssistant.java the method is. I can find the class just fine…

Second, do you want to remove the item from the shop or change the price?

You’re missing the point.
Somewhere, the shop is multiplying the Prices.txt number by something and that ends up to be the “buy” price. I just want it to be directly the Prices.txt price, no multiplier.

There is no multiplier.

Add a fury to a shop. The fury is 100 coins, not 100k, not 50k, not 10k. 100 coins.

Just because your server says that, doesn’t mean all of them are.

My server has the exact same problem. I try spawning max cash like “2147000000” of it and it spawns “2147483647”.

I’m not talking about spawning, I’m talking about a damn shop price.

Theres two itemprices.txt

Where’s the second one?
[/quote]
Search your source folder cuz I cannot remember where.[/quote]
I was being sarcastic, because I know there is only one Prices.txt
Something in ShopAssistant.java is multiplying the Prices.txt price by a percent and using it as the buying price, but the selling price is Prices.txt

Read full topic
